comment.author: jishi
comment.text:
Yes it will, if you specify varyByHeaders="X-Original-Url" for the cache. Thats what I use right now.
A simple work-around before this patch is applied is to manually do this in your HttpApplication by adding a BeginRequest-eventhandler that adds this header, if one don't want to patch monorail manually.
